hotciv.framework

Interface GameObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CivDrawing

    public interface GameObserver
    Defines the Observer role for a Game. This source code is from the book "Flexible, Reliable Software: Using Patterns and Agile Development" published 2010 by CRC Press. Author: Henrik B Christensen Computer Science Department Aarhus University This source code is provided WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY either expressed or implied. You may study, use, modify, and distribute it for non-commercial purposes. For any commercial use, see http://www.baerbak.com/

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void tileFocusChangedAt(Position position)
      invoked whenever the user changes focus to another tile (for inspecting the tile's unit and city properties.)
      void turnEnds(Player nextPlayer, int age)
      invoked just after the game's end of turn is called to signal the new "player in turn" and world age state.
      void worldChangedAt(Position pos)
      invoked every time some change occurs on a position in the world - a unit disappears or appears, a city appears, a city changes player color, or any other event that requires the GUI to redraw the graphics on a particular position.

    • Method Detail

      • worldChangedAt

        void worldChangedAt(Position pos)
        invoked every time some change occurs on a position in the world - a unit disappears or appears, a city appears, a city changes player color, or any other event that requires the GUI to redraw the graphics on a particular position.
        Parameters:
        pos - the position in the world that has changed state

      • turnEnds

        void turnEnds(Player nextPlayer,
            int age)
        invoked just after the game's end of turn is called to signal the new "player in turn" and world age state.
        Parameters:
        nextPlayer - the next player that may move units etc.
        age - the present age of the world

      • tileFocusChangedAt

        void tileFocusChangedAt(Position position)
        invoked whenever the user changes focus to another tile (for inspecting the tile's unit and city properties.)
        Parameters:
        position - the position of the tile that is now inspected/has focus.
